page.title: 08YOUR FRIENDLY LOCAL VANDAL
page.content: Good afternoon, ladies and gentlemen, you are now entering Lillington - and you're welcome to it! This place is really boring! We used to have real fun on a Saturday night, smashing up the Mason Avenue bus shelter, but they took it away last week - in a paper bag! Breaking the wings off the angels in the graveyard was good too, but we ran out of angels and no-one buys posh graves any more,- I wonder why? I smashed a blokes face in yesterday for writing "MUFC" on the shopping centre wall,-then I sprayed "COV. CITY RULES"over the top,well you don't want rubbish like that on walls, do you? We were going down the town tonight to start a fight, but I'll have to stay at home 'cos some rotten, anti-social, selfish hooligan's just set fire to me car! Somebody call a policeman-there's never one round when you need one!
